Interface PluginLog

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPluginLog, LookInsideLog, MavenPluginLog

    public interface PluginLog
    The Plugin-Log-Interface. Only for T7-Plugin-Logging.
    Author:
    Joerg Bellmann
